Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_3D_provider_attribute

The function AIL_3D_provider_attribute retrieves provider level attributes.

void AIL_3D_provider_attribute(
  HPROVIDER m3d,
  char const * attribute,
  void *value
);

In Parameters

m3d
indicates the M3D provider handle to retrieve the attribute from.
attribute
is a string variable describing the attribute to retrieve.

Out Parameters

value
is a pointer to a variable that will contain the return value.

Discussion

Each provider publishes an attribute called "Maximum supported samples" that returns the total 3D samples that can be opened.

Most providers also publish provider-specific preferences see the provider information at the end of this chapter for details.

Example: To obtain the total number of 3D samples that can be opened, you could use the following code: 


U32 max_3D_samples;
AIL_3D_provider_attribute( opened_m3d,
                           "Maximum supported samples",
                           &max_3D_samples );


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_attribute, AIL_set_3D_provider_preference
Related Basic Types: HPROVIDER, char const *, void
